There were creaks in the ceilings, paint peeling off walls and stains all over the carpets and bedding. 
When I went into our kitchenette to wash and sterilise the baby bottles there was no washing up liquid, sponge, teatowel etc...nothing I needed. I rang reception to ask for washing up liquid and was told they didn't have any I could take. I complained that "how can you have a kitchen with s sink and no liquid for guests to do dishes"?? Eventually another member of staff brought me some when she realised it was for baby bottles.
I wouldn't recommend this hotel and in future I would stay in a normal hotel room and just use sterilising tablets and the kettle.

Title: Awful - from start to finish
Text:
My wife and I stayed in this hotel last Thursday night and used the option to leave our car in the hotel carpark for the three days that we were away.  Our experience was awful from start to finish.  We were not certain of the location of the hotel even though we know the area well and relied on GPS to get there.  It is not in Dublin Airport or even near the airport  - it is in Ballymun.  The location of the hotel is difficult to find and arriving at night we found the atmosphere intimidating.  It was not clear how we might get into the car park and followed another car through a security gate.  There are two underground carparks - one one connected directly to the hotel - together with surface parking.  Sign posting was very poor and it was not clear how to get back to the hotel once we had found a space.   Cars parked just outside the hotel main door where being clamped while we were there.

The hotel itself is very shabby and the staff have clearly given up trying a long time ago.  Our room was very poor and we passed another where the customer was arguing with the staff.  Our room was not clean, the twin beds very uncomfortable and the bathroom barely passable.  Road noise was quite loud but thankfully the area was quiet.  We had a drink in the bar where the staff freely chatted to one another in an unknown language.  The seating in the bar area was very low and soft so we just sat up at the bar.  Even the vending machines didn't work.

On our return to the airport we rang ahead and the bus was over 15 minutes later than we were told.

Quite simply this is a hotel to be avoided.  If you are a female travelling alone or tourists visiting Dublin I would strongly advise against staying here - if you are flying out of Dublin Airport then try any of the other options even at the higher cost.

Title: Short night between flights
Text: We stayed at this hotel for 6 hours between our flights. The shuttle was waiting for us at the airport and brought us promptly to the hotel. The room was clean with convenient power outlets. The tub had a broken shower diverter, but otherwise the room was fine.

Title: Poor to Average
Text: This Hotel would have been rated average if not for the beds. We had traveled through Paris, London, and Scotland on this same vacation and in none of our stays were the beds of such poor quality. One thing about traveling is that a good night's rest is imperative. This hotel need to upgrade their beds! Also, it is called Metro Hotel Dublin "Airport" but was rather not near the airport, more like a 20 minute shuttle ride. As most American hotels do, the shuttle transportation from the hotel to the airport was not included or complimentary. We had chosen this hotel for proximity to the airport but sacrificed being close to the city. I will say their breakfast was great and the restaurant for the breakfast was roomy, clean and quiet. The local public bus transportation was also quite handy to the locale of the hotel.

Title: Decent place near airport and buses
Text: Did the job of a place to stay near the airport our first night in the country. Nothing special, rooms are tiny, bathrooms Even smaller. For the price you can find a B&B closer to the city. Did not eat the breakfast so no feedback there. Not really close to anything except the bus route, local food options limited, pay to park the car out front. The staff was very friendly and helpful though.

Title: Does the job
Text: Found this to be the cheapest option for staying the night before an early morning flight from Dublin airport.  Hotel is fine - stayed in worse! Beds are very soft and move a lot.  Rooms have safe, coffee and tea making facilities.  Wifi is free and not bad quality.  Reception staff friendly.  Food in restaurant is reasonable but service slow.  You get 10% off food when staying in hotel which is great.

Title: Not the best at the airport area
Text:
+ Airport transfer, friendly stuff, work-desk at the room, tea  and coffee in the room. 
- Not very close to the airport, bed not very comfortable and movable - wheels not fixed, WiFi only for 1 device, not very clean bath, during booking hotel charges full value prior to arrival to the hotel, not flexible with cancellation. 
To the city center you could get by bus or Taxi - ask at the reception.

Title: Do not stay here
Text: The only positive thing about this hotel was the comfortable bed. The wifi did not work well, the staff was not overly friendly or helpful. The shower was awful (it was impossible to set the temperature to anything in between freezing cold or scorching hot). Also there is an additional fee of 5 euro for the shuttle, a service that many other airport hotels offer free of charge. For the price we paid to stay here there are definitely better options for airport hotels.

Title: Not the best
Text:
We arrived before check in and were able to leave our bags in reception while we went out for the day. We asked crystal as the desk how long it would take us to walk from Dublin city centre to the Guinness factory. She said 15 minutes. Well it took us nearly an hour and a half and it was torrential rain so we were drenched. This totally ruined our day. If we knew it would have taken so long we would have got a taxi. 

Our room was standard, very outdated and plain, but the bed was comfy. HOWEVER, there was wee on our toilet seat! Our bathroom obviously hadn't been cleaned and i find this absolutely disgusting! I would rate this hotel a 1/10 on hygiene!! 

The cleaner was rude and kept coming in our room even though we had a 'do not disturb' sign on our door. 
On the morning of our departure the maid came in our room at 10am and asked when we were leaving. Check out isn't until 12pm so this was very rude and annoying and we felt like they just wanted rid of us! 

I woke up many times during our 2 night stay because people were slamming doors and running up and down corridors. The walls are paper thin and you can hear everything.

It took us 30 minutes to get into the centre of Dublin by bus. Had i known how far away it was from the centre i never would have booked here. We spent ‚Ç¨60 on bus fares in 3 days!
The local area, ballymun is a rough area with horrible scenery. 

This hotel is ok if you are looking for a very cheap few days in Dublin with somewhere to just lay your head on a night. However i wouldn't stay here again if someone paid me.

Title: Terrible service and rooms full of stains
Text: We recently went to Dublin and stayed over in the Metro Hotel Dublin Airport. We arrived on the 20th August to check in. The receptionist was not friendly. I booked an executive non-smoking double room, but she checked us into a standard non-smoking room. She then charged me in full for the standard room. The room was smelling like smoke, stains on the carpet and the bed was literary skew. I went back and the manager on duty helped us to another room. This room was a little better, but the furniture is out of the 70's and it needed a paint. The manager on duty was the only friendly person in this Hotel. When I checked out, the same receptionist then wanted to charge me for the suite room I was checked in. I refuse to pay the difference. Then she said its fine I can go. After several days, I was charged on my credit card for the difference.  I will never stay there again and do not recommend it to anyone. It‚Äôs also very noisy with traffic in the morning. They should not be in business.

Title: Interesting
Text:
Grimm location, this is not "Dublin airport" unless you think that during busy times 10/15 minutes in a mini bus is on the airport grounds.   
Decor needs to be updated, reception staff very nice and helpfull, bar food fair,some bar staff good others not so good.Underground Car park secure but also used as storage.
Bus driver very good and honest.
Would I stay here again not to sure

Title: Fantastic
Text:
This was our 3rd time staying here and yet again, brilliant service. Managed to stay in the same suite as previouds visit which was great. Staff still as friendly as ever.

Our weekend was made that extra bit special with Federica on reception putting a bottle of wine and a birthday card from the hotel for my husband's birthday weekend. Then she gave us complimentary breakfast for the following morning.

All the little touches that make the difference.

Title: Spacious suite but NO air conditioning
Text:
To get a hotel near the airport we had to book a suite.  Lovely and spacious with separate bathroom, kitchen/dining/lounge and bedroom with king sized bed.  Even had a wardrobe with a safe.  Really nice.  However, night time came and we became increasingly hot, so much so we could not sleep. The reception staff said the next day that we could have opened windows but we had tried that earlier and not worked out how to do that.  In the night in desperation I rang reception and asked for somebody to come and adjust the air conditioning as I could not find the switch ( it had mentioned bedrooms had these in the guest guide).  A man came with a fan, informed us it was a 3 star hotel and they did not have air conditioning.  He did check that the wall heater was off.  The fan did help a bit and he did say to send for another if needed.

The pluses were that the bed was comfortable, there was a computer in the restaurant area that was easy to use, yay!!, there is a shop just across the road and it was only 5 minutes from the bus stop.  The reception staff were really helpful and friendly.

Don't ask for a roast on a Sunday, as they advertise, though.  There wasn't one!  Even though they say their Sunday speciality is a roast.  We ordered it and was told it was pork.  When it came it was like a pork chop without the bone, mashed potatoes and mixed vegies but there was gravy.  We queried if we had the right meals.  The chef came out and said it was a pork steak cooked in the oven and that he had not done roast potatoes.  The meal was enjoyable buy NOT a roast.

Title: Decent Hotel
Text: We stayed here for a night catching a early morning flight out of dublin. The hotel itself is nice but i was vary of the location. Rooms are good standard and the car park is quite secured. The staff were friendly and proffessional. I would use this hotel again

Title: Excellent Hotel
Text:
We have used this hotel a few times now coming in and out of dublin airport and never had any issues. The hotel is clean and tidy, decent food and secure car park. But what makes it a cut above the rest is the professional & friendly staff.  They are always courteous & eager to help and make your stay pleasant.
We have recommended this hotel to family and friends and would certainly continue to do so in the future..

Title: Practical, No Frills Hotel Convenient to Airport
Text: If you just need a bare-bones, clean room close to the Dublin Airport, then this is your place.  The room was comfortable, if not very dated, and the restaurant was acceptable. If you do not want your the last memory of your trip to Ireland to be lackluster, then do not stay here.

Title: Layover
Text: I was very happy with my stay. The shuttle bus took 11 minutes, with traffic, to get to the hotel. A small fee of ‚Ç¨2.50 is worth it. The staff at the hotel were friendly and helpful. The room was clean and spacious but maybe needed a little updating. The restaurant was lovely and the food well priced and delicious. I would recommend this hotel and would stay again if I needed an overnight before a flight.

Title: Slightly better than average but not great
Text: My family and I booked two rooms in this hotel for the night before our flight to the UK from Dublin airport. Staff were very friendly and accommodating. Hotel was very clean and tidy but in need of some new decor. Very 80's style with a stale smell of cigarette smoke even though all rooms and hallways forbid smoking with a ‚Ç¨500 fine if caught smoking. The hotel reminded me of your run-of-the-mill cheap American motel. Baths are small but you can choose to have either a shower or a bath. Bathroom was quite modern in comparison with the rest of the room, hallways and hotel. We chose not to eat in the restaurant as we thought the food was too expensive so we ordered from a chippers less than 50m away from the front door. Hotel isn't situated in the nicest of areas but for North Dublin the area isn't too bad I suppose. We got the shuttle bus from the airport to catch our flight. It costs up to ‚Ç¨5 (depending on your stay) and runs every half hour. I would stay here again.

Title: Very good hotel, great for a stop over.
Text: Spent 2 nights here at short notice, excellent place to stay, staff were very professional and very welcoming, rooms perfect for the short stay over very clean, one downside the carpet could do with a freshen up, they are a bit thread worn in the room I was in could do with replacement, but that was the only downside, the staff are really friendly and it is in an excellent position for both Dublin airport and the M50 or IKEA if your on an expedition there, its only across the road. Recommend it for a short stay over or a business trip.

Title: Very good
Text: Every member of staff here from reception  to bar and restaurant and courtesy bus are top class. Very friendly and efficient. We got a free upgrade to a suite which was very comfortable,  the fact that the walls needed a fresh coat of paint was no concern of ours as the room was totally spotlessly clean. We have stayed here a few times before an early morning flight and will be doing so again in the near future.

Title: could have been better
Text: The staff were excellent and friendly the rooms are a little older now, than when the pictures were taken so are getting a little frayed around the edges just enough to notice. The breakfast was plentiful buffet style but a bit pricey.

Title: Brilliant disabled rooms!
Text: Stayed here for the ed sheeran concert in croke park . My partner is wheelchair bound . The disabled room was one of the suites with a kitchen ( sink fridge microwave toaster & kettle ) room was great and clean . Beds were comfy and staff were all lovely and welcoming . It's also located very close to ikea great for shopping and close to city centre without being right in it . Planning on staying again and bringing our 3 year old son !

Title: Stay here if it the cheapest airport hotel!
Text: This hotel is not really near the airport at all, but does have a shuttle bus. The corridors and reception are very dingy. However the room catered for all we needed- a bed before an early morning flight. If it was really the cheapest hotel I would stay again but wouldn't really recommend.

Title: Decor and overall appearance take from this hotel
Text:
Stayed in Metro prior to our recent holiday and while it couldn't be described as luxurious it was fine. We were catching an early flight and so spent little time in the hotel however I would like to highly commend reception staff, bus drivers and security guard they were all more than helpful. Having read some previous reviews I was ultra conscious of cleanliness and agree that room was badly in need of redecoration and believe even a good industrial cleaning of wood work would brighten up the rooms which I would regard as basic but fine for the money.
on a positive note our car was safe, we were dropped and collected and slept great so basically it was fine and convenient. would I stay again? probably not as I'd just like that little bit extra in terms of ambience and atmosphere even if it's just for a night.

Title: great hotel, next to the airport.
Text:
Excellent stay at the Metro hotel for one night, check-in was easy, and the room was very spacious. The staff all were friendly and helpful. 
There was a good secure car parking area to leave the car at,  whilst we were on holiday,  with a shuttle bus every 15 minutes to leave you to the airport.
The location of the hotel, is very easy to get to from anywhere, as it is just off a motorway.

Title: Last resort when no hotel is available
Text: Pictures, I found them a bit deceiving. Rooms are nothing like that. They but clumsy, not very comfortable and worst of all there is no ventilation. I was literally suffocating in there. Breakfast served was good for nothing. Overpriced and cheap quality. Only reason I stayed there as it was close to airport and available for that night. Definitely will avoid this place in future.

Title: Very handy to airport
Text: Our room was very spacious, consisting of separate lounge area with kitchen facilities and sofa, bedroom and bathroom with great shower ( wet room style).  We booked our car into the carpark and used their shuttle service to the airport.  We would definitely recommend this hotel for, staying overnight, if your flight is the next day.  The staff were helpful and friendly and it was a convenient and stress free journey to Dublin airport.

Title: Recommended!
Text: Hotel absolutely recommended for its proximity to the airport and the convenient free shuttle service, still combined with an acceptable distance from the center (the bus stop is a few steps and in 20/25 minutes you are in the center). Staff at reception very friendly. Rooms are spacious compared to the average Dublin hotel, plus they are comfortable and quite modern. Perhaps some details could be improved, such as the bathroom door slightly ruined in the final part, but precisely are details that have not affected our judgment in the least. Also excellent restaurant. Book directly from their site, I have always found lower prices and great deals.

Title: Quick passage
Text: I stayed at this hotel one night, after landing in Dublin around 11pm and hiring a car for our tour. The hotel is located a few kilometers from the airport and offers free parking for guests. The rooms were modern though small. Cleanliness good but not excellent. What instead did not make me crazy was the breakfast that I found not up to the level of choice for the category. However, for a quick passage is fine. Would not recommend it for a stay for more than a few days in Dublin if only for the secluded location.

Title: We had a great time. I highly recommend this hotel
Text:
I stayed with a friend for 3 days in this hotel and I had a great time. I'll briefly list the reasons:
1. Proximity to the airport and free and very punctual shuttle service. (Best regards to the friendly driver)
2. Excellent welcome and friendly and helpful staff
3. Room cleaned every morning, spacious, with windows that open halfway for air exchange, perfect temperature and silence.
4. I tried breakfast and dinner in the hotel which I didn't mind. Average prices (‚Ç¨10 for breakfast if you don't get the Irish one)
5. The beauty of the hotel and the truly delightful lounge.
6. Bus stop for the center 2 minutes from the hotel with buses every 20 minutes. It was a myth: it's not far from the centre, it's easy to reach.

All this makes me say that I made an excellent choice and if I return to Dublin I will choose this hotel again.

Title: Hotel mit Manko
Text:
Gute Lage zum Flughafen und  gute Anbindung mit √∂ffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln in das Zentrum. Hotel sauber, Bar und Restaurant o.k.
Standartzimmer klein und noch kleineres Bad. Hauptmanko: die Betten.
Nach Rundreise durch Irland die schlechtesten Betten mit durchgelegenen Matrazen.

Title: Hotel confortable cercano a aeropuerto
Text:
Escog√≠ este hotel porque todo Dubl√≠n centro estaba lleno o a precios desorbitados por la celebraci√≥n de st Patrick's. Fue todo un acierto... Habitaci√≥n s√∫per confortable, parada de bus al centro en la puerta, servicio gratuito de bus desde/hacia aeropuerto, desayuno espectacular tanto por cantidad como por calidad (tienen 3 opciones, con la m√°s econ√≥mica quedas m√°s que satisfecho, pues es buffet). Lo mejor, el personal, atento y profesional. Nombro aquellos que recuerdo, pero fueron todos encantadores: Jennifer, Simona, Rita, gracias por hacer nuestra estancia tan agradable.
El precio, al menos cuando estuvimos, no era barato. Pero Dubl√≠n se ha convertido en una ciudad muy cara, m√°xime en fiestas de st Patrick, y el hotel est√° genial.

Title: BELLISSIMO !
Text: Ottimo hotel! posizionato vicino all'aeroporto e con i mezzi pubblici si arriva direttamente in centro citt√†. Personale gentile e disponibile . Camere ampie. pulite e fornitissime . Lo consiglio . A++++++++++++

Title: Ideal zum Absteigen vor den Heimflug ..
Text:
Gut zu erreichen im Umfeld des Flughafens in Dublin. Shuttle Service von/nach Flughafen (Parklatz/ Bereich 16). 
Typische Businesshotel mit komfortabler Ausstattung. Bar und Restaurant stehen wartenden Flugg√§sten zur Verf√ºgung. Personal ist entgegenkommend, es gibt einen Gep√§ckaufbewahrungsraum.
Gleich gegen√ºber ein Supermarkt, 10 Minuten entfernt der Park von Santry.

Title: Gutes Flughafenhotel vor einem fr√ºhen Abflug
Text:
Nettes Personal, sauberes Badezimmer. Die Fenster leider ziemlich undicht und sehr schmutzig, es war sehr zugig in der N√§he der Fenster. Wir hatten zwei Einzelbetten. Eines war ziemlich durchgelegen, das andere Bett war v√∂llig ok. 
Der kostenlose Shuttle zum Flughafen hat super geklappt!

Title: ottimale per chi deve prendere voli al mattino presto
Text: ho dormito l'ultima notte della mia permanenza a Dublino perch√® il volo partiva alle 6,20am. Disponibile servizio navetta per aeroporto. Ristorante interno dove si mangia discretamente. Unica nota per me poco gradevole √® l'aria condizionata ad una temperatura per me molto bassa tant'√® che ho cenato con il giubbotto addosso

Title: Delusione totale
Text: Non mi era mai capitato (ed ho viaggiato moltissimo in tutto il mondo) di entrare in una camera (e parliamo di un 4 stelle a 135‚Ç¨ per una notte!!) e scoprire che non era mai stata ripulita dal precedente soggiorno!!! Assurdo‚Ä¶non c‚Äôera nemmeno la carta igienica!! Guardo nella doccia ed era pieno di capelli‚Ä¶ non volevo crederci! Tiro su le coperte e le trovo macchiate e piene di peli!!! Incredibile‚Ä¶ spero sia stata ‚Äúsolo‚Äù una dimenticanza, ma credo proprio che il fatto che sia principalmente un hotel da una notte sola abbia lasciato credere che una riordinata sommaria fosse sufficiente!! Abbiamo ovviamente richiesto un cambio di camera e questa era in condizioni migliori ma comunque non pienamente soddisfacenti. Davvero una delusione  perch√© la struttura in se non sarebbe neanche male, abbastanza moderno e comodo come posizione se avete un volo di mattina molto presto. Per raggiungere il centro √® necessaria almeno mezz‚Äôora di autobus ma la fermata √® praticamente a due passi. Motivo per cui do comunque due stelle e non una!!!

Title: Falta de higiene y de informaci√≥n
Text: No hicieron la limpieza de la habitaci√≥n. Al llegar y ver que estaba la cama sin hacer, que no hab√≠an cambiado las toallas ni repuesto el papel de WC, fuimos a recepci√≥n y nos dijeron que se ten√≠a que reservar el servicio de limpieza  previamente, cuando nadie nos avis√≥ de ello.  No dispon√≠an de hojas de reclamaci√≥n.

Title: Ausgebranntes Hotel ohne Benachrichtigung
Text: Gebucht im M√§rz, Heute vor Ort ausgebranntes Hotel vorgefunden, schlechte Gegend, sieht von aussen alles nicht besonders aus in der Gegend, keine Benachrichtigung vom Hotel oder Booking.com bekommen. Auf eigene Kosten anderes Hotel auf die Schnelle am Flughafen gesucht. Besser, billiger und n√§her dran. Schlechte Info vom Anbieter Booking.com

Title: Ottimo rapporto qualit√† prezzo
Text: L'hotel, di recente costruzione, si trova nel quartiere Santry di Dublino, abbastanza lontano dal centro. Per√≤ poco distante, a soli 100m dall'hotel, c'√® un comodissimo autobus (se non sbaglio il nr.4) che con 2,60‚Ç¨ ti porta fino al centro in 30min circa con corsa diretta. Il personale √® davvero gentile e disponibile. Puliscono la stanza ogni singolo giorno e lasciano caff√® e th√® completamente gratis. La camera era piuttosto grande e il bagno pulitissimo e moderno. L'ho scelto perch√© come rapporto qualit√† prezzo √® davvero buono. Lo consiglio senza alcun dubbio

Title: Sehr gutes Hotel f√ºr eine Nacht in Dublin
Text:
Absolut sauberes, freundliches Hotel mit Pickupservices vom und zum Flughafen.
Leider an der Hauptverkehrsstra√üe, aber mit geschlossenen Fenstern geht es.
1/2 STS mit dem Linienbus in die City, der 50m vor der T√ºr h√§lt.

Title: Gran estancia
Text:
Durante los 15 d√≠as que me aloj√©, recib√≠ un trato genial de todo el personal. 
Instalaciones buenas, y muy recomendable su restaurante. Buena carta y un servicio excelente y amable de los camareros, especialmente Mario, Lorenzo, y de Shasha.

Title: Comodit√† e gentilezza
Text:
L'hotel √® vicino all'aeroporto e si pu√≤ raggiungere con la navetta che parte oggi mezz'ora circa al costo di‚Ç¨5.collegamento WiFi gratuito.
Le stanze sono tranquille e abbastanza spaziose, con bollitore e ferro da stiro.
Il personale √® davvero gentile e disponibile per eventuali problemi che si hanno viaggiando. Non ho fatto colazione.

Title: HOTEL FUNZIONALE
Text: Hotel nei pressi dell'aereoporto (15ximinuti 15 euro di taxi) molto comodo per tornare all'aereoporto con la navetta ma anche per raggiungere il centro (30 minuti di bus 4euro) camera con letto king size ottimo materasso pulizia ok.

Title: In ristrutturazione, ma c'√® tanto da fare.
Text: L'hotel √® veramente lontano dal centro (1 ora di bus), quindi non vale la pena se si √® turisti e si vuole visitare la citt√†. Io ero a Dublino per una conferenza al DCU, e la posizione √® buona (circa 2 km). L'albergo √® un po' vecchiotto ma durante la mia permanenza c'erano lavori di ristrutturazione, e questo e buono. Spero anche che lavorino sulle stanze: la mia aveva un odore non proprio piacevole, e la porta del bagno si stava disintegrando. Buono il servizio navetta per l'aeroporto. Personale multilingue e gentile.

Title: perfetto se in viaggio
Text: Siamo arrivati col nostro volo la sera tardi e dopo 8 min. di taxi eravamo in hotel, check in super veloce. Stanze moderne e pulite. La colazione non √® stata alla stessa altezza, sala un po' fatiscente, cibo scarso ma personale molto gentile (in tutto l'hotel).La mattina dopo navetta per tornare all'aeroporto a 5 euro cad., molto comoda e autista molto gentile che ci ha indicato poi il modo di raggiungere la zona di noleggio auto.

Title: Just Ok
Text: Buon hotel per posizione. Siamo arrivati tardi alla sera e quindi abbiamo scelto questo hotel per la sua vicinanza all'aeroporto. La camera era abbastanza pulita. Niente di eccezionale ma per una notte √® sufficiente.

Title: Buono
Text: Ci siano fermati solo una notte, siamo arrivati verso mezzanotte e siamo ripartiti presto la mattina quindi non abbiamo usufruito di particolari servizi, ma x quel poco che abbiamo visto era abbastanza pulito, con tutto il necessario presente nella camera. Niente di eccezionale, hotel piuttosto normale.

Title: C√≥modo, econ√≥mico y cerca del aeropuerto
Text:
Hemos pasado unos d√≠as alojados en un viaje de negocios. El hotel es correcto y la atenci√≥n es la adecuada. Est√° alejado del centro de la ciudad y depender√°s siempre de Taxi, aunque hay que decir que el precio es muy competitivo y resulta m√°s econ√≥mico que estar en un hotel del coraz√≥n de Dubl√≠n. La zona, adem√°s, es tranquila y poco ruidosa.
El servicio wifi es gratuito y funciona a gran velocidad, algo que se agradece en los viajes de trabajo. La habitaci√≥n es amplia, teniendo en cuenta el tama√±o habitual de los hoteles de este tipo.
El servicio de desayuno es correcto, sin grandes alardes, y la cafeter√≠a es un espacio agradable para, por ejemplo, degustar una pinta tras una jornada en el centro de la ciudad.
Por su relaci√≥n calidad-precio, no dudo en calificarlo como recomendable.

Title: Mejor de lo que esperaba
Text: Para ser un hotel "relativamente" barato,compar√°ndolo con otros de la misma categor√≠a,es c√≥modo,limpio y con un personal bastante atento.Llegamos directamente del aeropuerto,y bastante tarde para poder cenar; as√≠ que en recepci√≥n nos ofrecieron la posibilidad de pedir comida "a domicilio" y nos avisaron cuando lleg√≥.S√≥lo estuvimos una noche,ya que al d√≠a siguiente vol√°bamos a Belgrado y √©ste hotel queda muy cerca de aeropuerto.

Title: Solides Flughafenhotel
Text:
Wir waren hier eine Nacht vor unserem R√ºckflug. Das liegt sehr nahe am Flughafen und bietet einen Shuttle (vom Flughafen kostenlos, zum Flughafen EUR 5 / Person). 

Wir haben hier eine angenehme Nacht vor dem Flug verbracht - nicht mehr und nicht weniger. 

Sauber, grosse Zimmer, guter Service ... Nichts auszusetzen. Ausser das der Zimmerservice nur Getr√§nke in Verbindung mit Speisen liefert, keine Getr√§nke ohne Speisen. Schade, aber eben auch kein Beinbruch.

Title: Bellissima esperienza
Text:
Bellissima esperienza davvero ... viaggio molto per lavoro all'estero e quello che mi preme di pi√π √® la cucina e qui devo dire che i piatti sono molto buoni.. personale gentilissimo soprattutto Mario... 
Ciao Manuel di Ferrara

Title: Recomendable
Text:
Esta muy cerca del aeropuerto. Debido a que el vuelo lleg√≥ despu√©s de las 23.45 tuvimos que coger un taxI que nos cobr√≥ 15 euros (tarifa est√°ndar). Si llegas antes de esa hora tienes el servicio de transfer.
Habitaciones grandes y muy c√≥modas. El desayuno lo pagamos aparte y elegimos la opci√≥n m√°s barata, de 7.50 euros, pero como se hab√≠an acabado los pasteles nos dieron la opci√≥n de tomar cualquier tipo de producto del buffet por el mismo precio.
MUy cerca hay una parada de bus que te lleva al Centro de Dubl√≠ndole en 25 minutos por unos 3 euros.

Title: Urlaubsstart und -ende
Text: G√ºnstig gelegen am Flughafen (sehr regelm√§√üiger Flughafenshuttle), freundliches und zuvorkommendes Personal, saubere kleine Zimmer mit bequemen Betten, Klimaanlage im S√ºdlagenzimmer am hei√üesten irischen Tag des Jahres leider defekt ;)

Title: Gutes Hotel im nichts
Text: Gutes Hotel, exzellentes Fr√ºhst√ºck und gute Speisekarte f√ºr Lunch and Dinner, aber leider im Herzen von nichts. Einzige Ausnahme ein ALDI in 10 Minuten Fu√üweg. Sonst Taxi oder bei Ortskenntnissen √∂ffentliche Busse. Zimmer sauber, gutes W- LAN und sehr freundliches Personal. L√§stig sind die 5 E f√ºr den Airport-Shuttle den √§hnliche Hotels in Flughafenn√§he ohne Zuschlag anbieten-

Title: Pessima esperienza
Text: Ho soggiornato al Metro Dublin Hotel Airport per una notte, e ho scelto questa struttura solo perch√© necessitavo di un hotel vicino all'aeroporto. Ebbene, questo √® l'unico aspetto da salvare in questo hotel. La struttura √® piuttosto imponente, l'ingresso √® attraverso una porta automatica azionata dalla reception, quindi potrebbe capitare di dover aspettare che qualcuno venga ad aprirvi. Gli interni sono piuttosto anonimi. La stanza era piccola, decisamente poco confortevole, e necessiterebbe di una rinnovata (soprattutto il bagno). La porta di ingresso si apriva a fatica, la porta del bagno non si poteva lasciare aperta, e questo creava un ambiente molto poco piacevole (umidit√† e cattivi odori persistenti). Da ultimo, il ristorante, situato al piano terra dell'hotel, proponeva piatti piuttosto vari, ma di qualit√† piuttosto bassa. In sintesi: non ci tornerei.

Title: ‚ÄúBien si se desea estar cerca del aeropuerto.‚Äù
Text:
Es un hotel ideal si se va de paso o se desea estar cerca del aeropuerto ya que hay de 5 a 10 minutos en coche. Hasta las doce hay servicio de minibus que te lleva o te trae del aeropuerto. El hotel est√° bien.

Nos cobraron dos veces porque hubo un error, pero lo solucionaron r√°pido.

Title: Costoso
Text: Camera pulita, spaziosa. Bagno enorme. L'unico neo sono le 100 euro a notte e senza colazione. Il bus √® a 5 minuti e il centro citt√† dista circa 20 minuti di autobus buoni. Il biglietto a tratta √® di 2,80. In ogni caso √® difficile trovare un buon albergo economico a dublinp

Title: Mai pi√π!
Text: Dall'aeroporto si pu√≤ raggiungere l'albergo in 10min con la navetta gratuita (zone 14, parking terminal 1) e questo √® l'unico punto positivo per loro. Camera sporca e moquette con macchie sospette. Insonorizzazione assente, si sentono tutte le macchine che passano. Colazione abbondante ma non compresa (11‚Ç¨ extra). Prezzo alto rispetto alla qualit√† offerta.

Title: Hotel in Flughafenn√§he mit Flughafenshuttle und super K√ºche!
Text: Der Shuttleservice war sehr praktisch und ging regelm√§√üig vom fr√ºhen morgen bis sp√§t in die Nacht. Das Personal war immer sehr freundlich und hilfbereit. Am besten war das Essen, sowohl das typisch irische Fr√ºhst√ºck mit Spiegeleiern und Speck und sogar einer Pfannkuchenmaschine, aber auch die reichhaltige und abwechslungsreiche Speisekarte. Der Salat war knackig frisch und das Steak nach Wunsch genau richtig gebraten. Nur die Zimmereinrichtung ist etwas in die Jahre gekommen und eine Renovierung w√ºrde gut tun.

Title: Super Service, sehr gutes Essen
Text: Shuttle Service funktionierte einwandfrei. Sehr freundliche Mitarbeiter in jeden Bereich des Hotels. Das Bett ausgezeichnet, sehr gut geschlafen. Angenehm √ºberrascht war vom B√ºgelbrett und B√ºgeleisen im Zimmer. Der Haarf√∂n  versteckte sich etwas ungew√∂hnlich in der Schreibtisch Schublade. Fr√ºhst√ºck typisch irisch - R√ºhrei/Spiegelei, Bacon, W√ºrstchen, Bohnen immer frisch. Toll fand ich die Pfannkuchen Maschine. Fr√ºhst√ºckskaffe hat sehr gut geschmeckt. Sehr gute K√ºche im Restaurant. Alles in einem - sehr zufrieden.

Title: Gutes Hotel mit Shuttle Service und guter Busanbindung zur Stadt
Text:
Anreise: Problemlos. Nach kurzem Anruf, war das Shuttle binnen 15 Minuten da und ein gut gelaunter Fahrer brachte mich zum Hotel und gab direkt Tipps.

Hotel: Empfang, Beratung, Freundlichkeit: Top

Zimmer: altes typisches ruhiges Zimmer. Das Bad f√§llt leider komplett durch. Veraltete Armaturen, Haare und sauber ist anders. Schade

Restaurants: Super Dinner, nette moderate Bar.

Fr√ºhst√ºck: typisches britisches Essen, nicht wirklich viel Auswahl, kein K√§se, keine Wurst

Alles in Allem ein gutes Hotel... Man braucht ca. 25 Minuten mit dem Bus 2,10‚Ç¨, ein Taxi zum Temple Bar Viertel kostet 15‚Ç¨! 

Der Shuttle zum Flughafen funktioniert problemlos. Als Zwischenstopp super, f√ºr l√§ngeren Aufenthalt fraglich.

Title: Muy bien
Text:
Solo por el excelente wifi ya merece las 5 estrellas. 

Por lo dem√°s,  un hotel limpio,  la habitaci√≥n amplia y ba√±o moderno.  Los trabajadores muy amables y atentos. 

Hotel muy bien comunicado con el centro de la ciudad

Title: One of my worst choices/Peor es dif√≠cil
Text: Tras media hora de espera en el aeropuerto, con un fr√≠o que pelaba, llamamos al hotel (llamada internacional) para saber que por qu√©.Todos los shuttles de los dem√°s hoteles ya hab√≠an pasado 2 √≥ 3 veces. En el hotel no ten√≠an la habitaci√≥n que hab√≠amos reservado y nos dieron otra. En recepci√≥n dan informaci√≥n rid√≠cula y nadie nos avis√≥ ni exactamente de cu√°les autobuses pasaban cerquita ni de que el 4, en domingo, pasa cada hora!.Si preguntas a d√≥nde ir para ver museos interesantes s√≥lo te hablan del de la cerveza (que por cierto cuesta 20‚Ç¨ cada persona) y el del whiskey, pero no tienen idea de los museos espectaculares (y gratis) que tienen cuadros fant√°sticos desde la Edad Media (Filippo Lippi, Guercino, Piero della Francesca, Anguissola ...) hasta los d√≠as de hoy pasando por Picasso, Gainsborough y...  no digo m√°s. En la ba√±era hab√≠an partes oxidadas y la alfombra de goma estaba sucia de moho. La limpieza en general no es de lo m√°s deseable. Para no estar buscando otro hotel reservamos m√°s d√≠as. Pregunt√© : ¬øes preciso que baje a pagar ahora? Nooo me dijeron. Al d√≠a siguiente, volviendo de pasear, porque nosotros somos as√≠, insistimos en pagar. Pagamos. Y una vez en la habitaci√≥n nos dimos cuenta por los mensajes del banco que ya se lo hab√≠an cobrado durante el d√≠a! As√≠ que tuvimos que volver a bajar y protestar para que nos devolvieran lo que hab√≠an cobrado de m√°s. En el men√∫ del bar restaurante pon√≠a cosas que no ten√≠an y en una ocasi√≥n, en un plato en el que, lo dice el men√∫, deber√≠a haber parmesano (que es un queso que se hace con leche de vaca), hab√≠a "pecorino" (que se hace con leche de oveja y tiene un sabor completamente distinto). Si ped√≠as aceite y sal para adobar la ensalada te serv√≠an la ensalada sin nada porque a ellos no les parec√≠a posible (cuisine internationale!). Finalmente lleg√≥ el d√≠a de marcharse y ... sorpresa! El shuttle (un peque√±o van) para ir de vuelta al aeropuerto se pagaba! Vamos que resumiendo cuentas, al precio del hotel, por estar en el quinto pino y cobrarte para llevarte de vuelta al aeropuerto, hay que a√±adirle10‚Ç¨ diarios de bus y 10 para ir al aeropuerto. Y cosa medio rara: el precio de las habitaciones cambia cada d√≠a. ...

Title: Senza pretese
Text:
Situato a met√† strada tra l'aeroporto e il centro di Dublino con la fermata dell'autobus a 200 metri. Se si vuole raggiungere il centro in taxi il costo medio si aggira intorno ai 20 euro.
Camere nella media piuttosto pulite, un p√≤ meno gli spazi comuni che presentano macchie sulla moquette e odori forti..

Title: Ottimo servizio
Text:
Colazione a buffet illimitata, cena abbastanza buona anche se porzioni limitate.
√â possibile raggiungere l'aeroporto di Dublino in meno di 5 minuti di auto, oppure sfruttando il servizio offerto dall'Hotel.
Pulizia delle camere giornaliere con cambio di asciugamani.
Dispone di ampie sale per congressi prenotabili gratuitamente.

Title: Per una notte √® ok
Text:
Camera ok pulita e spaziosa, unica pecca il rumore, personale molto gentile e disponibile essendomi io lamentato della rumorosit√† hanno subito fatto di tutto per aiutarmi . Purtroppo il cambio di Camera non √® avvenuto poich√© l hotel era pieno, almeno cos√¨ mi √® stato detto.
Servizio navetta per l aeroporto a 5e comodo e veloce.
Tutto nella norma

Title: Hotel discreto, ma con l'aeroporto non c'entra nulla
Text: attenzione! Se pensate di selezionare questo albergo per la vicinanza con l'aeroporto, sappiate che non √® affatto cos√¨. Noi lo avevamo scelto per questo motivo (il nome ci ha tratto in inganno), arrivando con l'aereo a mezzanotte ci sembrava una buona soluzione. L'hotel √® discreto, ma il taxi per raggiungerlo ci impiega quasi lo stesso tempo che a raggiungere il centro, per cui non ne vale la pena.
